be.ac.ulb.infof307.g07.Views

Class MapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g07.Views.MapView

  • public class MapView
extends java.lang.Object
    Cette classe represente la vue dans la structure MVC cad la classe s occupant de l affichage de la carte et de ses composantes graphiques.

    Un objet de cette classe est cree par les classes suivantes: MapController, MapMouseDblClickHandler et MainGUI, dans leurs constructeurs respectifs et la methode mapInitialized() de MainGUI.

    See Also:
    MainGUI, MapController, MapMouseDblClickHandler

      void refreshMap()
      refreshing the map by zooming in and zooming out by 1 -1 of current is because, when double clicking on map it will automatically zoom by 1, so to keep the same zoom level -1 is necessary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapView

        public MapView(com.lynden.gmapsfx.GoogleMapView newGoogleMapView)
        Constructeur de l'objet MapView.

        On cree on objet MapOptions avec certains parametres predefinis. On cree une googleMapView (sur base de ce MapOptions) via la methode createMap et on l'assigne a notre objet googleMap.

        Parameters:
        newGoogleMapView - la vue pour la carte googlemaps.
        See Also:
        googleMap

    • Method Detail

      • getGoogleMap

        public com.lynden.gmapsfx.javascript.object.GoogleMap getGoogleMap()
        Retourne l'objet de la carte google maps.
        Returns:
        L'objet map de type GoogleMap.

      • addMarker

        public void addMarker(PokeMarker pokeMarker)
        This method waits for the new created PokeMarker to create a Marker on Map. PokeMarker is different than Marker. PokeMarker is stored in Map and Marker is an object of the GoogleMap. PokeMarker is the model and Marker is the view.
        Parameters:
        pokeMarker - the custom pokemon marker object.
        See Also:
        PokeMarkerMouseClickHandler, googleMap

      • refreshMap

        public void refreshMap()
        refreshing the map by zooming in and zooming out by 1 -1 of current is because, when double clicking on map it will automatically zoom by 1, so to keep the same zoom level -1 is necessary
        See Also:
        googleMap
